title: PBE Play Button
body: So I am encountering an issue after pressing the play button in the PBE (im a new PBE player) and I dont have any rp or ip to purchase 16 champions. What do i do?

replies.body: What specific issue are you having after pressing the play button? o.O
Hit the play button "An Error Has Occurred" then the play button does nothing until restarting the client then the cycle can start all over again.

That sounds like an error caused by a poor connection to the PBE Servers. I'd recommend going over our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it addresses local network settings that often conflict with League.

Let me know if this helped.

I might as well add on to this thread that the create button is also not routing me to make a PBE account I just go accepted to. From what the support page says they know of an issue with the play button and they are working on it so maybe that could be causing an issue with the create account button for new invites as well.
You need to be logged in your main account which you signed up for, then when you click i wanna help it opens the sign up page

I'm having the same issue on the PBE the tool tip says make sure you own 16 champions but we can't purchase RP, cant get into a game to earn IP and we have no way of starting a match with free week champions. wtf riot?
